serviceOverview.title: CONTAINMENT
serviceOverview.description: Explore our Invisible Fence® Brand solutions to keep your pets safe and secure in your yard or home.

clientTestimonials.text: I was so worried about my dog's destructive behavior, but after just a few training sessions, he was a completely different dog. I'm so grateful for the expert training and guidance. It's truly made a difference in our lives.
clientTestimonials.author: Sarah M.

clientTestimonials.text: The Invisible Fence® Brand system has been a game-changer for our family. Our dog is free to roam our yard without any worries. The installation process was smooth and efficient, and the customer service has been top-notch.
clientTestimonials.author: Michael L.

clientTestimonials.text: I was skeptical at first, but the positive reinforcement training techniques have worked wonders with my stubborn pup. Our trainer was patient, knowledgeable, and always willing to answer my questions. I highly recommend this company!
clientTestimonials.author: Emily C.

behaviorTraining.title: Behavior Training: Transform Your Pet's Behavior
behaviorTraining.description: Behavior training is essential for a well-adjusted and happy pet. Our experienced trainers use positive reinforcement techniques to address a variety of behavioral issues.

issuesAddressed.title: Aggression
issuesAddressed.description: We'll help you understand the root causes of aggression and develop strategies to prevent and manage it.

issuesAddressed.title: Anxiety and Fear
issuesAddressed.description: We'll teach your pet coping mechanisms and relaxation techniques to reduce anxiety and fear.

issuesAddressed.title: Excessive Barking
issuesAddressed.description: We'll identify the triggers for excessive barking and implement training strategies to reduce it.

issuesAddressed.title: Destructive Behavior
issuesAddressed.description: We'll help you understand why your pet is engaging in destructive behavior and provide solutions to prevent it.

issuesAddressed.title: Separation Anxiety
issuesAddressed.description: We'll teach your pet how to cope with being alone and reduce separation-related anxiety.

process: Initial Consultation: We'll discuss your pet's specific needs and goals.
Behavior Assessment: We'll evaluate your pet's behavior to develop a customized training plan.
Training Sessions: We'll provide hands-on training to teach you and your pet the necessary skills.
Follow-up Support: We'll offer ongoing support to ensure your pet's continued progress.
packages: Individual Sessions: Personalized training tailored to your pet's specific needs.
Group Classes: Affordable group training for basic obedience and socialization.
In-Home Training: Convenient training in your own home environment.
behaviorTraining.cta: Contact us for a customized training plan.

obedienceTraining.title: Obedience Training: Build a Strong Bond with Your Pet
obedienceTraining.description: Obedience training is the foundation for a well-behaved pet. Our training programs focus on teaching essential commands and building a strong bond between you and your pet.
methods: Positive Reinforcement: We use rewards and praise to motivate your pet.
Tailored Training: We customize our training approach to your pet's breed, age, and personality.
packages: Beginner Obedience Classes: Learn basic obedience skills in a group setting.
Advanced Obedience Training: Master advanced obedience skills and prepare for competitions.
One-on-One Sessions: Personalized training tailored to your pet's specific needs.
obedienceTraining.cta: Bundle and save with our package deals.

containmentSystems.title: Containment Systems: Keep Your Pet Safe and Secure
containmentSystems.description: Invisible Fence® Brand electronic pet containment systems provide a safe and effective way to keep your pet confined to your property.
howItWorks: Transmitter: Emits a radio signal that creates a boundary around your property.
Boundary Wire: Buried underground to define the perimeter of the containment area.
Invisible Fence® Brand Computer Collar®: Worn by your pet, it receives the radio signal and delivers a safe static correction when your pet approaches the boundary.
benefits: Safety: Keep your pet safe from traffic, predators, and other dangers.
Aesthetics: A more attractive alternative to traditional fencing.
services: Professional Installation: Expert installation of your Invisible Fence® Brand system.
Ongoing Maintenance: Regular system checks and maintenance.
Collar Fitting and Training: Proper fitting and training for your pet's Invisible Fence® Brand Computer Collar®.

whyInvisibleFence.introduction: We trust Invisible Fence® Brand with our pets. That's why we use Invisible Fence® Brand exclusively for yours.

keyFeaturesAndBenefits.customizableContainmentZones: Tailored to suit indoor and outdoor environments of various sizes.
keyFeaturesAndBenefits.durableCollars: Designed to withstand outdoor conditions and active pet lifestyles.

professionalInstallationAndTraining.installation: Trained technicians handle installation to ensure proper setup.
professionalInstallationAndTraining.postInstallationTraining: Post-installation pet training ensures pets adapt quickly and safely.

keyFeaturesAndBenefits.customerSupport: Reliable assistance anytime for troubleshooting or guidance.

safetyFeatures.failSafeMechanisms: Fail-safe mechanisms to protect pets in case of system malfunction.
safetyFeatures.adjustableCorrectionLevels: Adjustable correction levels for pet comfort and safety.

comparisonWithAlternatives.lowerMaintenanceCosts: Invisible Fence® Brand offers lower maintenance costs compared to traditional fencing.
comparisonWithAlternatives.lessIntrusiveDesign: The design is less intrusive and blends seamlessly with your yard.
comparisonWithAlternatives.enhancedSafety: Provides enhanced safety for your pets.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

questions.question: What services do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer behavior training, obedience training, and installation, maintenance, and service of Invisible Fence® Brand electronic pet containment systems.

questions.question: How long does training typically take?
questions.answer: The duration of training varies depending on the specific needs of your pet and the complexity of the behavioral issues. However, most clients see significant improvement within a few weeks of consistent training.

questions.question: What types of pets do you work with?
questions.answer: We work with a variety of pets, including dogs and cats.

questions.question: How does Invisible Fence® Brand work?
questions.answer: The Invisible Fence® Brand system uses a wired boundary to keep your pet safely confined to your property. A lightweight, waterproof Computer Collar® signals your pet when they approach the boundary.

questions.question: Is it safe for my pet?
questions.answer: Yes, the Invisible Fence® Brand system is completely safe for your pet. The static correction is mild and harmless.

questions.question: What happens if the system stops working?
questions.answer: We offer 24/7 customer support to assist with any system issues. We can also provide emergency service to quickly resolve any problems.

questions.question: What is the warranty period for the system?
questions.answer: The warranty period for Invisible Fence® Brand systems varies depending on the specific product and installation package. Please consult with a representative for more information.

faq.contact: For additional questions, feel free to contact us directly at (231) 938-1138 or email us at contact@greatlakescontainment.com.

aboutUs.intro: At Great Lakes Containment & Training, we're passionate about pets, just like you. We provide peace of mind by keeping your dog or cat safe and happy at home. As an exclusive provider of Invisible Fence® Brand products, we offer superior technology and personalized service to create a perfect solution for your pet and your property.
aboutUs.companyHistory: Established in 1991, Great Lakes Containment & Training is focused on our customers. Our business is committed to constant improvement to provide the highest level of services for you and your pet, with a convenient and professional experience from your first contact…through training completion and beyond.
aboutUs.missionStatement: We work in a consultative environment to ensure that each client receives an Invisible Fence® Brand solution that meets their individual needs. We continue to support each customer into the future, creating a lifetime of value.
aboutUs.coreValues: We believe in patience, positivity, and a deep respect for the bond between pets and their owners.
